name: Game Word Finder
description:
Game Word Finder helps you quickly and easily find words for your favorite word games.

Type the letters you have available (use ? to represent blanks or wildcards) and tap the Find Words button. All matching words from a dictionary of over 100,000 english words are displayed.

Advanced filters allow you to quickly find the exact word you need.

Examples:
1. You are playing a game and you see 'DOG' on the board and you have 'RSTLNE' in your rack. You want to make a word using the 'DOG' on the board and your letters in hand. Type 'RSTLNE' in the 'Letters to Use' field and 'DOG' in the 'Filter' field and select 'Any' as the match.

2. A crossword solution is 7 letters and you know that it starts with 'A' and ends with 'E'. In addition, you know that the fourth letter is 'T'. Type '????' in the 'Letters to Use' field and 'A??T??E' in the 'Filter' field.

Multiple match types: Any (filter is anywhere in word), Start (words must start with filter), End (words must end with filter), Exact (words must match filter).

Game Word Finder is a general purpose search tool that can be helpful when playing many of the most popular word games, such as: Scrabble®, Words With Friends®, crosswords, anagrams, hangman, and more. It contains a large comprehensive dictionary to maximize word discovery. As such it will produce words that are NOT in the official Scrabble® word lists.

Words With Friends® is a registered trademark of Zynga Inc. Scrabble® is registered trademark of Hasbro, Inc. in the United States and of Mattel, Inc. elsewhere.
